title: links for 2006-02-07
html:
• Buddy's Pizza - Voted Detroit's #1 Square Deep Dish Pizza
    Good pizza and chicken wings!
    (tags: pizza warren michigan geotagged geo:lat=42.521146 geo:long=-83.026619 food)
  • herrmann2.c
    It's a floor wax! It's a dessert topping! It's source code! It's a stereogram! (Not a schooner)
    (tags: stereogram sourcecode programming)
  • CBBC Newsround | Animals | Herman could be 'biggest bunny'
    "The mighty bunny weighs a massive 7.7kg, and his ears are a lengthy 21cm - almost as long as most pet rabbits are tall. And he is almost 1m tall."
    (tags: big bunnies rabbits animals nifty)
  • OPML Editor support:
    "Here are two new OPML Editor apps, one for Mac, one for Windows."
    (tags: opml usertalk frontier)
  • Tumultuous Porter (Goat Scrotum Ale)
    "This recipe is for a dark, spicy porter ale."
    (tags: beer goats)
  • The Kick-Ass Mystic Ninjas - Sometimes, the commercials are worth it
    "There was a MacGyver MasterCard commercial on the Super Bowl right now."
    (tags: superbowl commercials advertising macgyver)
  • IFILM - TV Clips: Mastercard: MacGyver -
    "MacGyver is back and armed with an air freshener, a tube sock, paper clips, rubber bands and a few other odds and ends." Pretty nifty, this.
    (tags: video superbowl advertising commercials nifty)
  • J. Alexander's
    (tags: food troy michigan restaurants geotagged geo:lat=42.561259 geo:long=-83.185128)
  • nuxx.net - Honda Music Link iPod Adapter Review
    "Unfortunately, my good experiences with the Honda Music Link iPod Adapter ended here."
    (tags: honda music ipod automotive cars)
  • MakeZine.com: iSight Tripod Mount
    "by Steve Vigneau"
    (tags: friends isight apple make via:c0nsumer)
  • QDB: Quote #610717
    "... what do you think the game would be called if mario had a gun? ... Metroid."
    (tags: irc quotes funny gaming nintendo mario metroid)
  • Russell Beattie Notebook » Back to Old School Blogging
    "I subscribe to several Ego feeds from Technorati, Google, IceRocket, etc. so I should see the response if it’s out there. See you in the blogosphere!"
    (tags: metablogging)
  • How to Quickly Get an iTunes Podcast URL - dekstop weblog
    "iTunes already has OPML export."
    (tags: itunes opml podcasts apple podcasting)
  • Workbench: Using the Feed Validator on RSS
    "Eric Lunt and I made an RSS Advisory Board proposal today to officially recommend and use the Feed Validator."
    (tags: rss hackingfeed aggregators syndication)
  • The Straight Dope: In Nintendo's "Duck Hunt," how does the TV know when you've hit a duck?
    "But really the TV is shooting the gun."
    (tags: nintendo hardware gaming)
  • bnode - semantic weblog / JSONC, JSONI, JSONP: Creating tailored JSON from SPARQL query results
    "My current sparqlet (SPARQL-driven portlet) implementations mostly use queries generated server-side, the results are returned as application-specific JavaScript."
    (tags: json rdf)
  • Incantis ECM Blog: LIFE CACHING - LIFE CONTENT MANAGEMENT
    "The LIFE CACHING trend is approaching mainstream appeal: every day brings consumers even more powerful cameraphones, even bigger memory cards, and even more streamlined do-it-yourself or serviced story-telling tools."
    (tags: metablogging)

Archived Comments

  • Sean Conner
    2006-02-07T22:29:49

    Was there a time when Buddy's wasn't voted the best deep pan pizza? I remember they were considered the best deep pan pizza in the Detroit area in the mid-80s.

    Sigh … if only I didn't live 1200 miles away. I really miss Buddy's pizza.
